description: Leveraging advanced technologies, lighter – but reliably durable – materials, and a highly focused design process, we created their lightest approach shoe, the Konseal LT. Built to cover rugged ground while you’re carrying a pack and climbing gear, it delivers underfoot support and protection, agility to handle shifting terrain, and the confident grip of a Vibram® Megagrip outsole. The inner provides barefoot comfort, and the heel folds flat so you can wear it as a clog while belaying or at camp.
name: Arcteryx Konseal LT - Mens
